title: Smokers 20 percent more likely to quit when cigarettes cost $1 more

title_detail.value: Smokers 20 percent more likely to quit when cigarettes cost $1 more

summary: Smokers were found to be 20 percent more likely to quit smoking when packs of cigarettes cost just one dollar more, according to a new public health study.

summary_detail.value: Smokers were found to be 20 percent more likely to quit smoking when packs of cigarettes cost just one dollar more, according to a new public health study.
